string.value: #b#p1052103##k in #b#m103000000##k seems to have something she wants to say...

The news of you helping #p1052103# seems to have gotten around. #p1052103# says that many people have been asking her to introduce you to them. She says to go see #b#p1012003##k in #b#m100000000##k...\r\n\r\nHuh? That's your town.. What could it be about? Chief Stan seems to need some help.
Chief Stan doesn't seem to believe your abilities.

Hey, Evan. Are you busy? I have something to tell you... I told someone about how you helped me before, and now that person wants to meet you. I'm not bothering you, am I?\r\n#b#L0#No, you're not bothering me. But who wants to meet me?#l\n#k
It's Chief Stan of #m100000000#. Something happened and he's looking for someone strong. Won't you go over to #b#m100000000# Town#k and help #bChief Stan#k? I'll write you a Letter of Introduction.
Thanks for accepting my request without giving me grief. I was scared that you might snap at me.
Hmph, fine. Something happened in #m100000000#, but I'm sure Chief Stan will find a capable person to help him.

Is that you, Evan? Shouldn't you be helping out at the farm? Hm? Isn't this #t4032465#? Hm, I asked her to introduce a capable adventurer to me... Why did she send this with you? Let me give it a read.
You still haven't gone over to #m100000000#? Go to #b#m100000000##k and find #b#p1012003##k. Tell him #p1052103# sent you.
Evan, what are you doing here? Shouldn't you be helping out at the farm?
What? You lost the Letter of Introduction? I can quickly write you another one, but please be careful not to lose it again.
